document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour hebdo du 21/12/2011
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (21/12/2011) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Réductions PlayStation Plus Dungeon Defender – 20% de réduction Christmas Lights Dynamic Theme by Studio Output – 100% de réduction Nouveau contenu PlayStation Network Jeux complets (PS3) Ferrari Challenge Deluxe (12.99€) – PEGI 3 – Taille du fichier: 1502 Mo Jurassic Park: The Game – Full Season (19.99€) – PEGI 16 – Taille du fichier: 2240 Mo Ico & Shadow of The Colossus Classics (29.99€) – PEGI 12 – Taille du fichier: 8 GB Ico Classics (17.99€) – PEGI 12 – Taille du fichier: 1759 Mo Oddworld: Stranger’s Wrath (12.99€) – PEGI 12 – Taille du fichier: 3248 Mo Shadow of The Colossus Classics (17.99€) – PEGI 12 – Taille du fichier: 6160 Mo Sports Champions (29.99€) – PEGI 12 – – Taille du fichier: 12 GB Le PlayStation MOVE est nécessaire Supercar Challenge (12.99€) – PEGI 3 – Taille du fichier: 2953 Mo Essais et déblocages (PS3) Dungeon Defender (9.99€) – PEGI 12 – Taille du fichier: 1382 Mo Démos (PS3) The King Of Fighters Xiii – PEGI 12 – Taille du fichier: 224 Mo PSone (PS3/PSP) Gex (4.99€) – PEGI 12 – Taille du fichier: 119 Mo Pandemonium (4.99€) – PEGI 7 – Taille du fichier: 81 Mo NeoGeo (PS3) World Heroes (8.99€) – PEGI 12 – Taille du fichier: 49 Mo minis (PS3/PSP) Orbit (2.99€) – PEGI 3 Ajouts de jeu et contenus (PS3) Ace Combat Assault Horizon – PEGI 16 – Online Map Pack (9.99€) – Aircraft Skin Pack 2 (5.99€) – Boost And Turn (1.99€) – Compatibility Pack 6 (gratuit) – Enhanced Bombs+ (1.99€) – F-14D Jolly Rogers (2.99€) – F-15C ‘White Dragon’ (2.99€) – F/A-18F ‘Jolly Rogers’ (2.99€) – Quick Assault+ (1.99€) – Skill Set 3 (4.99€) Batman Arkham City – PEGI 16 – Batman Arkham City – Arkham Bundle Pack (14.99€) – Batman Arkham City – Arkham City Skins Pack (4.99€) – Batman Arkham City – Batman Inc. Batsuit Skin (gratuit) – Batman Arkham City – Challenge Map Pack Dynasty Warriors 7 Xtreme Legends – PEGI 12 – Costume Pack 2 (0.99€) – Excel Stage Pack 1 (2.99€) EyePet & Friends – Christmas Pack (gratuit) – PEGI 3 Motorstorm Apocalypse – Festive Livery (gratuit) – PEGI 16 Need For Speed The Run – Signature Edition Booster Pack (2.99€) – PEGI 16 Renegade Ops – PEGI 16 – Coldstrike Campaign (4.49€) – Reinforcement Vehicle Pack (2.49€) Saints Row the Third – Warrior Pack (2.49€) – PEGI 18 LBP 2 – The Electric Mayhem Costume Pack (5.99€) – PEGI 7 – Inclut les contenus suivants disponibles également à l’unité : – Animal Costume (1.99€) – Floyd Pepper Costume (1.99€) – Janice Costume (1.99€) – Zoot Costume (1.99€) Magic the Gathering: Duels of the Planewalkers 2012 – PEGI 7 – Dark Heavens Foil (0.99€) – Dark Heavens Unlock (0.99€) – Forest’s Fury Foil (0.99€) – Forest’s Fury Unlock (0.99€) – Ghoulkeeper Foil (0.99€) – Ghoulkeeper Unlock (0.99€) – March To War Foil (0.99€) – March To War Unlock (0.99€) Rock Band Network – PEGI 12 – Courage – Alien Ant Farm (1.49€) – Cry Of An Eagle – Free Spirit (1.49€) – Echo – Dance for the Dying (0.79€) – Selkies: The Endless Obsession – Between the Buried and Me (1.49€) – Show Me What You’ve Got – Powerman 5000 (1.49€) Rock Band 3 – PEGI 12 – Experience Jimi Hendrix Pack 01 (8.99€) – Inclut les contenus suivants disponibles également à l’unité : – All Along The Watchtower – Jimi Hendrix (1.49€) – Angel – Jimi Hendrix (1.49€) – Dolly Dagger – Jimi Hendrix (1.49€) – Freedom – Jimi Hendrix (1.49€) – Gypsy Eyes – Jimi Hendrix (1.49€) – Long Hot Summer Night – Jimi Hendrix (1.49€) – Voodoo Child – Jimi Hendrix (Slight Return) (Live) Warhammer 40000: Space Marine – PEGI 18 – Alpha Legion Chapter Skin (1.99€) – Blood Angels Chapter Skin (1.99€) – Salamanders Chapter Skin (1.99€) – Chaos Unleashed pack (7.99€) Who Wants To Be A Music Millionaire? (2.99€) – PEGI 3 Thèmes Studio (PS3/PSP) The Studio – ( PS3 ) Zerbamine Dynamic Theme by Erwin Koh (2.99€) – (PSP) Zerbamine Theme by Erwin Koh (0.99€) Thèmes dynamiques (PS3) Jeux – Oddworld: Stranger’s Wrath HD – Dynamic Theme (1.99€) Nature – Earth View Theme (2.99€) – Dynamic impressive beach theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Sea Waves And Rocks Theme (1.99€) Lieux – Destination: Madagascar Paradise (1.99€) – Liverpool Dynamic Theme (2.49€) – Mayan Temple (2.49€) – Dynamic holiday in Turkey theme four (1.99€) – Dynamic Statue at Piazza Del Popolo Theme (1.99€) Sci-Fi/Fantasy – Dynamic Horror Theme 3 (1.99€) – Utherworlds: Aadyasha (2.49€) – Utherworlds: Cohabitations (2.49€) – Utherworlds: Reckoning Day (2.49€) Saisonniers – Dynamic Christmas Pinup Theme (1.99€) – Utherworlds: Christmas Town (2.49€) – Dynamic Christmas tree with snow theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Christmas Background Theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Christmas snow falling theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Christmas Tree In Crystal Ball Theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Christmas tree lights theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Christmas tree theme two (1.99€) – Dynamic Christmas winter scene theme (1.99€) – Dynamic falling snow theme (1.99€) – Dynamic New Year Confetti Theme (1.99€) – Dynamic New Year Fireworks Theme (1.99€) – Dynamic winter snow at Christmas theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Christmas tree lights theme (1.99€) Sport – Real Madrid Dynamic Theme (2.49€) – Dynamic Swing Ride Theme (1.99€) Fond d’écran (PS3) Armageddon Riders Merry Xmas (gratuit) Vidéos (PS3) Access Episode 014 WWE ’12 Launch Trailer Yakuza Dead Souls – Weapons Trailer Signature Edition Booster Pack Assassin’s Creed® Revelations – Ps3 Trailer Assassin’s Creed Revelations – Story Trailer Kingdoms Of Amalur: Reckoning – Destiny And Fate Trailer Kingdoms Of Amalur: Reckoning – Factions & Fae Trailer Renegade Ops Coldstrike Campaign Trailer Renegade Ops Reinforcement Vehicle Pack Trailer Motorstorm Rc Trailer
Youpi , cette semaine un thème de noël gratuit ! Autant ne rien mettre parfois …
